name: Infraster
overview:
Infraster service was earlier a part of QualiSpace, India’s TOP Web Hosting & ICANN Accredited Domain Registrar. Later in 2010 QualiSpace separated its Servers and Managed Service Product line to separate Unit â€“ Infraster. Infraster is focused on delivering customer centric solutions to clients across the globe. Through Infraster we enable our customers to efficiently and effectively leverage on their technology investments.

Infraster offers special attention in chief Infrastructural areas and uses itâ€™s proven IT infrastructural assessment tools and technologies to plan solutions that are best suited for our clientâ€™s business strategy. Infraster aims at providing the customer centric approach to our clients by integration of people, process and technologies. We just donâ€™t improve the way you experience IT but we also partner with you on each step to discover and enjoy the potential behind it. Some of the key features which makes Infraster stand apart from other companies are as follows:
